title: State Reporting Deadline
message: ‚ö†Ô∏è COMPLIANCE: Most states require accident reports to be filed within 10 days. Remind the policyholder to file a police report ASAP if not already done. Failure to report may jeopardize the claim.

title: Do Not Admit Fault Advisory
message: üö® CRITICAL: Advise the policyholder NEVER to admit fault at the scene or to any third party. Fault determination is made by the insurance company based on evidence and investigation. Admitting fault may void coverage.

title: Salvage Title Disclosure
message: üìã NOTE: If the vehicle is declared a total loss, inform the policyholder that the title will be converted to a salvage title. This must be disclosed if the vehicle is ever resold. Failure to disclose is a violation in most states.

title: Uninsured Motorist Notification
message: ‚ö†Ô∏è COMPLIANCE: If the other driver is uninsured or it's a hit-and-run, check if the policyholder has Uninsured/Underinsured Motorist (UM/UIM) coverage. They have the right to file under their own UM/UIM policy.

title: HIPAA Privacy Notice
message: üö® HIPAA: All medical and personal information discussed on this call is protected under HIPAA. Do NOT disclose policy details, medical information, or beneficiary information to unauthorized parties. Verify caller identity before proceeding.

title: Contestability Period Warning
message: ‚ö†Ô∏è CONTESTABILITY: Check if the policy is within the 2-year contestability period. If so, the insurer has the right to investigate and potentially deny the claim for material misrepresentation on the application. Flag the claim for underwriting review.

title: Beneficiary Dispute Protocol
message: ‚ö†Ô∏è LEGAL: If there is a beneficiary dispute or if the caller mentions a divorce or separated spouse, the claim must be placed on HOLD. Escalate immediately to the Legal department. Do NOT discuss payout amounts or timelines.

title: Suicide Clause Advisory
message: üö® SENSITIVE: Most life insurance policies contain a suicide exclusion clause for the first 2 years. Handle this topic with extreme sensitivity. Do NOT volunteer information about the suicide clause unless directly asked. Document the cause of death as reported and flag for Special Claims review.

title: Call Recording Disclosure
message: üìã REMINDER: Ensure the caller has been informed that this call may be recorded for quality and training purposes. This disclosure is legally required in most jurisdictions.

title: Anti-Fraud Statement
message: üìã COMPLIANCE: If fraud is suspected, do NOT accuse the caller. Document observations factually and flag the claim for Special Investigations Unit (SIU) review. Any person who knowingly files a false insurance claim is subject to criminal prosecution.
